# Run Workflow

This tutorial demonstrates how to run a WDL Workflow on AnVIL.  It uses the fun and accessible [WDL puzzles](https://support.terra.bio/hc/en-us/articles/360056599991) workspace to run a "Hello, World!" style workflow.  By showcasing how input parameters are specified and where output files can be found, this exercise helps provide context before writing your own WDL Workflow.

**Learning Objectives**

1. Import WDL by cloning a Workspace
1. Run Workflow using AnVIL
1. Examine Output to appreciate data flow
